entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
